src:
Farage says he will not stand for MP in election – video
03 Nov 2019, 11:47 by BBC | Andrew Marr




Nigel Farage has announced he will not make an eighth attempt to become an MP in December’s general election. ‘I have thought very hard about this: how do I serve the cause of Brexit best,’ the Brexit party leader told the BBC’s Andrew Marr. He said he would help campaign for his party’s 600 candidates in the election
